description: Tasty and fairly fuss free mid week meal option.
name: Broccolini & Tuna Quiche Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dice onion and place in a pan with oil, cook on a low heat, just to soften. Add garlic after about 5 minutes and keep on low heat until fragrant but not browned.
Defrost 2 sheets of puff pastry and add to a flan dish (My dish is quite large this recipe makes a lot of filling)
Flake tuna and add to whisked eggs before adding milk, cheese, broccolini, chopped capers and pepper. Add cooked onion and garlic.
Add to the prepared pastry (You can par bake the pastry if you want to before adding the filling)
Bake in a preheated oven for 4550 minutes or until golden on top and set.
Slice tomatoes in 1/2 and add to the top of the quiche (you can add more or less, this is more for presentation rather than adding much to the dish)
